## Installation

### Quick Install

**Linux (amd64):**
```bash
curl -sL https://github.com/kad/compose2podman/releases/download/VERSION/compose2podman_VERSION_linux_amd64.tar.gz | tar xz
sudo mv compose2podman /usr/local/bin/
```

**macOS (arm64):**
```bash
curl -sL https://github.com/kad/compose2podman/releases/download/VERSION/compose2podman_VERSION_darwin_arm64.tar.gz | tar xz
sudo mv compose2podman /usr/local/bin/
```

### Package Managers

**Debian/Ubuntu:**
```bash
wget https://github.com/kad/compose2podman/releases/download/VERSION/compose2podman_VERSION_linux_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i compose2podman_VERSION_linux_amd64.deb
```

**RHEL/Fedora/CentOS:**
```bash
wget https://github.com/kad/compose2podman/releases/download/VERSION/compose2podman_VERSION_linux_amd64.rpm
sudo rpm -i compose2podman_VERSION_linux_amd64.rpm
```

**Alpine:**
```bash
wget https://github.com/kad/compose2podman/releases/download/VERSION/compose2podman_VERSION_linux_amd64.apk
sudo apk add --allow-untrusted compose2podman_VERSION_linux_amd64.apk
```

**Arch Linux:**
```bash
wget https://github.com/kad/compose2podman/releases/download/VERSION/compose2podman_VERSION_linux_amd64.pkg.tar.zst
sudo pacman -U compose2podman_VERSION_linux_amd64.pkg.tar.zst
```

### Verify Installation

```bash
compose2podman -version
```

## Usage

Convert Docker Compose to Kubernetes Pod YAML:
```bash
compose2podman -input docker-compose.yaml -type kube -output pod.yaml
podman play kube pod.yaml
```

Convert Docker Compose to Quadlet files:
```bash
compose2podman -input docker-compose.yaml -type quadlet -output ./quadlet
cp quadlet/* ~/.config/containers/systemd/
systemctl --user daemon-reload
```

## Checksums

SHA256 checksums are provided in `compose2podman_VERSION_checksums.txt`

Verify downloads:
```bash
sha256sum -c compose2podman_VERSION_checksums.txt
```
